Actions.Text: REFERRED TO CIVIL SERVICE AND PENSIONS
REFERRED TO CIVIL SERVICE AND PENSIONS

Title: Creates a pilot program to examine the effects of waiving the state civil service examination fee
Summary: Creates a pilot program to examine the effects of waiving the state civil service examination fee; requires an annual report on the results of such program.
LawCode: Amd ยง50, Civ Serv L
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the civil service law, in relation to creating a pilot program to examine the effects of waiving the state civil service examination fee; and providing for the repeal of such provisions upon the expiration thereof
